prompt: Design an app lock screen with a white background and a centered layout. Display a lock icon (Icons.lock) at the top, sized at 80 pixels with a red color (Colors.red). Below, show the title 'App Locked' in bold 28px black text, followed by a subtitle 'Enter PIN to unlock' in 16px grey text with 10px spacing. Create a 4-digit PIN input section with 4 circular containers (60x60 pixels) with red borders, arranged in a 2x2 grid with 10px spacing. Each container shows an empty circle or a filled red circle for entered digits. Below, include a 3x4 grid keypad with numbers 1-9, 0, and a delete button. Keypad buttons are 70x70 pixels, circular with a light red background and black text. Use 30px spacing between elements and wrap the layout in a Column with MainAxisAlignment.center and 20px padding.
